original_text: But you, Israel's people, say, “The Lord is not doing what is right!” Do you really think that is true? No, you are the people who do not do what is right, you Israelites!
korean_text: 그런데 이스라엘 족속은 이르기를 주의 길이 공평하지 아니하다 하는도다 이스라엘 족속아 나의 길이 어찌 공평하지 아니하냐 너희 길이 공평하지 아니한 것 아니냐

sentences.original_text: "The Lord is not doing what is right!"
Do you really think that is true?
No, you are the people who do not do what is right,
